name: BookSelf App
description: I worked with a team of six developers to create this interactive book-borrowing website using several computing languages, including Javascript, SQL, Sequelize, Express, and CSS. Users can create an account, add a book they own using their ISBN number, and then other logged in users can borrow it to their account.

name: Pandemic Tracker
description: I created this global pandemic tracker using React Globe and an API hosted by John Hopkins that tracks Covid-19 cases, deaths, and recoveries.

name: Interactive Weather App
description: I created this Weather App using Javascript, HTML, CSS, local storage, and Open Weather's API. The app enables you to search a city name and see the current weather, a five-day forecast, and icons indicating the weather and time of day. It also saves your previous search in your local web storage so that it remains when you return.

name: Coronavirus Animation
description: I worked with a team of artists and animators on this Coronavirus animation, which amassed more than one million views.

name: Neil Degrasse Tyson Funks the Universe
description: I edited NDT's appearance on the Rogan Podcast to Wax Taylor, and animated this music video that appeared in several media publications.

name: The Age of Surprise
description: I wrote and animated this video for the U.S. Air Force to present to Congress in a seminar about funding needed for cyber security.
